name: Delusional Detective
description:
As a detective you try to figure out the mysterious circumstances under which Roland died. Examine participants, gather clues and find the right spot to apply them to unlock an intriguing story and figure out piece by piece what happened. But be wary, your detective senses are not always spot on and you might find misleading clues that you have to identify and integrate correctly to make sense of this case. It can drive you mad though if your not careful.

This game is an entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2022 and was made within one week. The theme was  "It is not real".
